Sentencas: As the anode of a solid oxide fuel cell, Ni/YSZ cermet material was investigated.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: We measured the power output, IR resistance and polarization resistance as a function of the Ni/YSZ volume ratio.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: IR resistance decreased as the Ni/YSZ ratio was increased.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: The linear relationship between IR resistance and the reciprocal values of the nickel surface area indicates that the contact resistance between the electrolyte and the anode dominated IR resistance.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: On the other hand, polarization resistance increased as the Ni/YSZ ratio was increased.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: Analysis of AC impedance plots indicated that polarization resistance contributed to the number of reaction sites which were ascribed to the triple boundary layer.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: Moreover, the boundary between nickel particles and zirconia particles in the anode worked as the triple boundary layer.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, we proposed the double layer anode, which consisted of the interfacial layer and the bulk layer.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: A cell with a double layer anode exhibited high performance.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC

Sentencas: The interfacial layer and the bulk layer had a strong effect on IR resistance and polarization resistance, respectively.
Titulo: Properties of Ni/YSZ cermet as anode for SOFC
